mapper.select: SELECT count(*) as total, sum(case when status = 0 then 1 else 0 end) as leisureCount, sum(case when status = 1 then 1 else 0 end) as bindingCount, sum(case when status = 2 or status = 5 then 1 else 0 end) as transportingCount, sum(case when status = 3 then 1 else 0 end) as retentionCount, sum(case when status = 4 then 1 else 0 end) as recycleCount from rsps_${entCode}box_info;

SELECT count(*) as total, sum(case when status = 0 then 1 else 0 end) as leisureCount, sum(case when status = 1 then 1 else 0 end) as bindingCount, sum(case when status = 2 or status = 5 then 1 else 0 end) as transportingCount, sum(case when status = 3 then 1 else 0 end) as retentionCount, sum(case when status = 4 then 1 else 0 end) as recycleCount from rsps_${entCode}box_info where operate_time between '${beginTime}' and '${endTime}';
SELECT count(*) FROM rsps_${entCode}box_info where operate_time < '${confineTime}';
select count(*) from rsps_${entCode}box_info as bi inner join rsps_box_base as bb on bi.rfid = bb.rfid where bb.create_time < '${confineTime}';
